meanings.sent1: The painting's crudeness was evident in its simple brush strokes.
meanings.sent2: Her crudeness in table manners made the formal dinner uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: Despite his crudeness, he always managed to make people laugh.
meanings.sent4: The crudeness of his jokes was like a blunt tool trying to carve elegance.
meanings.sent5: The crudeness of the design stood out like a sore thumb among the elegant pieces.

meanings.definition: Rough or unpolished in manner or behavior
meanings.sent1: His crudeness in conversation often led to misunderstandings.
meanings.sent2: The wrestler's crudeness in the ring intimidated his opponents.
meanings.sent3: She tried to teach him etiquette to smooth out his crudeness.
meanings.sent4: The crudeness of his actions was like a storm in a teacup.
meanings.sent5: The crudeness of his humor left everyone cringing at the party.

meanings.definition: Not carefully or skillfully made or done
meanings.sent1: The crudeness of the wooden chair was evident in its rough edges.
meanings.sent2: Her crudeness in sewing resulted in uneven seams.
meanings.sent3: Despite the crudeness of the drawing, it held a certain charm.
meanings.sent4: The crudeness of the construction left the building vulnerable to the elements.
meanings.sent5: The crudeness of the pottery gave it a rustic appeal.
